slug.description: The unique slug identifier for this tape (e.g., wand-1729177200000)

code.description: Short alphanumeric code for easy lookup (e.g., 'a3x')

when.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the tape was created

zipUrl.description: Direct URL to download the original ZIP file with frames and audio

acUrl.description: Permanent link to view on aesthetic.computer (e.g., https://aesthetic.computer/!a3x)

thumbnail.description: Thumbnail image from midpoint frame, 3x scaled with nearest neighbor (max 1MB)

video.description: MP4 video with 3x pixel scaling and audio soundtrack (max 50MB)

ref.description: MongoDB ObjectId reference for bi-directional sync
